attributes.action: I did not vote for you to lead the country your a dictator Mr Brown who took power from another who was elected by the people of this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We did not vote for him to lead us he took power off Tony Blair by stabing him in the back at every chance he could!

I give you the Dictator himself Gordon Brown.

I ask that you agree with me and put your mark on thist petition to force mr Brown to have an election now.

Thankyou

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
